msg: packages/rpm/rhel-4/apr.patch : Fix RPM build broken by r19057.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Revert part of r18894 with respect to status commands.
Passes merge tests #1 (performing a merge, with mixed results), #9 (merging
similar trees ancestrally unrelated), #16 (merge into missing must not break
working copy), and #29 (merge a replacement of a directory).
All merge tests pass.  (So did export and externals.)
(svn_ra_serf__do_status): Pass in status target as the update-target param

author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r19039, correctly escaping some meta characters in the
regular expressions used to validate APR/APR-Util version numbers.
